summary.span: Encapsulates the account data and operations common to all security principals.

span.span: Encapsulates the account data and operations common to all security principals.

summary.span: This is the abstract base class from which all security principals are derived.

span.span: This is the abstract base class from which all security principals are derived.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Classes de extensão personalizada que derivar desta classe pode chamar o construtor do construtor de classe derivada para inicializar a classe base.Custom extension classes that derive from this class can call this constructor from the derived class constructor to initialize the base class. summary.span: Returns a collection of group objects that specify the groups of which the current principal is a member.

span.span: Returns a collection of group objects that specify the groups of which the current principal is a member.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Esse método sobrecarregado retorna apenas os grupos dos quais a entidade é membro direto; Nenhuma pesquisa recursiva é executada.This overloaded method only returns the groups of which the principal is directly a member; no recursive searches are performed. Resultados da pesquisa recursiva estão disponíveis para objetos de usuário.Recursive search results are available for user principal objects. Para obter mais informações, consulte o método .For more information, see the method. Se o armazenamento principal é o AD DS, a lista de grupos de contém o grupo do usuário primário que é identificado pelo atributo de ID de grupo primário no objeto do AD DS.If the principal store is AD DS, the list of groups contains the user's primary group that is identified by the primary group ID attribute in the AD DS object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearchResult`1<class System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.Principal> GetGroups() cil managed
Public Function GetGroups () As PrincipalSearchResult(Of Principal)

summary.span: Returns a collection of group objects that specify the groups of which the current principal is a member.

span.span: Returns a collection of group objects that specify the groups of which the current principal is a member.

returns.span: A collection of objects that specify the groups of which the current principal is a member.

span.span: A collection of objects that specify the groups of which the current principal is a member.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Esse método retorna somente os grupos dos quais a entidade é membro direto; Nenhuma pesquisa recursiva é executada.This method returns only the groups of which the principal is directly a member; no recursive searches are performed. Resultados da pesquisa recursiva estão disponíveis para objetos de usuário.Recursive search results are available for user principal objects. Para obter mais informações, consulte o método .For more information, see the method. Os grupos que são retornados por este método podem incluir grupos de um escopo diferente e armazenamento que a entidade de segurança.The groups that are returned by this method may include groups from a different scope and store than the principal. Por exemplo, se a entidade de segurança é um objeto do AD DS que tem um DN de "CN = SpecialGroups, DC = Fabrikam, DC = com, o conjunto retornado pode conter grupos aos quais pertence o" CN = NormalGroups, DC = Fabrikam, DC = com.For example, if the principal is an AD DS object that has a DN of "CN=SpecialGroups,DC=Fabrikam,DC=com, the returned set can contain groups that belong to the "CN=NormalGroups,DC=Fabrikam,DC=com. Se a entidade atual for uma entidade de segurança do AD DS, os grupos retornados incluem o grupo primário de entidades de segurança, conforme indicado pelo atributo "primaryGroupId" no objeto do AD DS.If the current principal is an AD DS principal, the returned groups include the principals primary group, as indicated by the "primaryGroupId" attribute on the AD DS object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearchResult`1<class System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.Principal> GetGroups(class System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalContext contextToQuery) cil managed
Public Function GetGroups (contextToQuery As PrincipalContext) As PrincipalSearchResult(Of Principal)

param.name: contextToQuery
param.span: The object that specifies the context against which the query is performed.

span.span: The object that specifies the context against which the query is performed.

param.span: When the context is located in another domain, the query is performed against the principal objects' representation in the specified context.

span.span: When the context is located in another domain, the query is performed against the principal objects' representation in the specified context.

summary.span: Returns a collection of group objects that the principal is a member of and that exist in the store provided by the specified context parameter.

span.span: Returns a collection of group objects that the principal is a member of and that exist in the store provided by the specified context parameter.

returns.span: A collection of objects that specify the groups of which the current principal is a member.

span.span: A collection of objects that specify the groups of which the current principal is a member.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Esse método retorna somente os grupos dos quais a entidade é membro direto; Nenhuma pesquisa recursiva é executada.This method returns only the groups of which the principal is directly a member; no recursive searches are performed. Resultados da pesquisa recursiva estão disponíveis para objetos de usuário.Recursive search results are available for user principal objects. Para obter mais informações, consulte o método .For more information, see the method. Os grupos que são retornados por este método podem incluir grupos de um escopo diferente e armazenamento que a entidade de segurança.The groups that are returned by this method may include groups from a different scope and store than the principal. Por exemplo, se a entidade de segurança é um objeto do AD DS que tem um DN de "CN = SpecialGroups, DC = Fabrikam, DC = com, o conjunto retornado pode conter grupos aos quais pertence o" CN = NormalGroups, DC = Fabrikam, DC = com.For example, if the principal is an AD DS object that has a DN of "CN=SpecialGroups,DC=Fabrikam,DC=com, the returned set can contain groups that belong to the "CN=NormalGroups,DC=Fabrikam,DC=com. Se a entidade atual for uma entidade de segurança do AD DS, os grupos retornados incluem o grupo primário de entidades de segurança conforme indicado pelo atributo de ID de grupo primário no objeto do AD DS.If the current principal is an AD DS principal, the returned groups include the principals primary group as indicated by the primary group ID attribute on the AD DS object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Save(class System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalContext context) cil managed

param.name: context
param.span: The that specifies the server or domain against which operations are performed.

span.span: The that specifies the server or domain against which operations are performed.

summary.span: Saves the changes that were made on the principal object to the store.

span.span: Saves the changes that were made on the principal object to the store.

summary.span: If this is a new principal object, this method inserts it into the specified context.

span.span: If this is a new principal object, this method inserts it into the specified context.

summary.span: If the principal has already been persisted, it is moved from the original context to the specified context.

span.span: If the principal has already been persisted, it is moved from the original context to the specified context.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Se o contexto de entidade especificado é diferente do contexto existente, a entidade de segurança é movida para o contexto especificado e o objeto principal não está localizado no local antigo.If the specified principal context differs from the existing context, the principal is moved to the specified context, and the principal object no longer is located in the old location. Se o contexto especificado é idêntico ao contexto existente, este método salva as atualizações que foram feitas no objeto principal para o armazenamento.If the specified context is identical to the existing context, this method saves the updates that were made on the principal object to the store. O tipo de contexto do contexto especificado deve ser o mesmo tipo que o tipo de contexto atual.The context type of the specified context must be the same type as the current context type. Este método não pode ser chamado usando o tipo de contexto do computador.This method may not be called by using the computer context type.

summary.span: Gets or sets the user principal name (UPN) associated with this principal.

span.span: Gets or sets the user principal name (UPN) associated with this principal.

value.span: O UPN associado a essa entidade ou nulo se o UPN não foi definido.

span.span: The UPN associated with this principal or null if no if the UPN has not been set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Configurar essa propriedade como null remove o UPN existente, se houver.Setting this property to null removes the existing UPN, if one exists.
